CustomField.description: Set the log level for which a Log Event will be sent to an external HTTP service. Whenever a Log Event is created and the level of the event is encompassed by the currently set HTTP Callout Log Level, a record will be created. Otherwise, no record will be created.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set the log level for which a Log Event will be sent to an external HTTP service. Whenever a Log Event is created and the level of the event is encompassed by the currently set HTTP Callout Log Level, a record will be created. Otherwise, no record will be created.
CustomField.label: HTTP Callout Log Level
